thread.title: Visitation planned for girl killed in road rage shooting
thread.title_full: Albuquerque Journal | Visitation planned for girl killed in road rage shooting

author: Associated Press
title: Visitation planned for girl killed in road rage shooting
text:
Community members are invited to pay their respects at a public visitation for a 4-year-old girl who was killed in a road rage shooting on an Albuquerque freeway.
A public visitation for Lilly Garcia will be held at Nativity of the Blessed Virgin Mary Catholic Church on Monday evening. The wake comes after hundreds of people gathered Saturday at a candlelight vigil.
A funeral Mass will follow Tuesday morning, and the girl will be buried at Sunset Memorial Park.
Lilly was fatally shot Oct. 20 after the pickup truck driven by her father became involved in a road rage altercation with another car.
Police arrested Tony Torrez, who was accused of another road rage incident in 2006 and served time for a 2001 voluntary manslaughter conviction.
